line-9: The role is based at Three Bridges Rail Operating Centre [TBROC] in Crawley, West Sussex. They will form part of a small Telecommunications engineering team based on-site at TBROC. Note: There is no on-call commitment and no requirement to go trackside with this role. The role is to primarily provide 1st line fault response, remote monitoring and technical assistance with 3rd line fault investigations on the following equipment: VOIP phone systems, IP phone systems, IP Networks, Fixed Telecommunications Network [FTN] and Global System for Mobile Communications � Railway [GSM-R].
